text:
[ Angada kills Mahaparsva, the minister of Ravana.]

महोदरेतुनिहतेमहापार्श्वोमहाबलः ।

सुग्रीवेणसमीक्ष्याथक्रोधात्सम्ररक्तलोचनः ।।6.99.1।।

अङ्गदस्यचमूंभीमांक्षोभयामाससायकैः ।
meaning: सुग्रीवेण by Sugriva, महोदरे Mahodara, निहते killed, महाबलः mighty, महापार्श्वः Mahparsva, समीक्ष्य gazing, अथ then, क्रोधसम्रक्तलोचनः eyes turned red in anger, सायकैः army, अङ्गदस्य in Angada's, भीमाम् terrific, चमूम् troops, क्षोभयामास commotion
translation: Gazing at Mahodara killed by Sugriva, mighty Mahaparsva's eyes turned red in anger. He created a commotion in the army of Angada.

meaning: सःसर्वशः severed, मुख्यानाम् leader, वानराणाम् Vanaras, उत्तमाङ्गानि limbs, अनिलःwind, वृन्तात् stalks, फलमिव fruits like, कायेभ्यः from body, पातयामास thrown
translation: That leader (Mahaparsva) severed the heads of Vanara leaders from their body just as wind drops fruits from stalks.

meaning: अथ and then, सःराक्षसः that Rakshasa, सुसङ्कृद्ध: infuriated, केषांsome, वानराणाम् Vanaras, बाहून् arms, स्कन्दाम् shoulders, इषुभिः arrows, चिच्छेद shattered, केषांचित् some intent upon, पार्श्वम् sides, व्यदारयत् tore off
translation: Then with his arrows, that Rakshasa (Mahaparsva) shattered the arms of some, shoulders of some, sides, and ribs of some Vanaras.

meaning: महापार्श्वेन Mahaparsva, बाणवर्षेण rain of arrows, अर्दिताः dejected, तेवानराः those Vanaras, सर्वे all, विषादविमुखाःsad look, गतचेतसः lost senses, बभूवुः wore
translation: By the rain of arrows of Mahaparsva, the Vanaras were dejected and wore a sad look on their face and lost senses.

meaning: अङ्गदःAngada, राक्षसार्दितम् oppressed by the Rakshasa leader, उद्विग्नम् frightened, बलम् army, निरीक्ष्य observing, पर्वणि full moon days, समुद्रःइव like an ocean, महाबाहुःbroad shouldered, वेगम् speedily, चक्रे exhibited
translation: Observing the army oppressed by the Rakshasa leader, Angada, endowed with broad shoulders, exhibited his might speedily like the ocean on full moon days.

meaning: वानरश्रेष्ठः foremost of the Vanaras, सूर्यरमशिसमप्रभम् radiance of sun's rays, आयसम् shone, परिघम् iron bar, गृह्य taking, समरे to battlefield, महापार्श्वे Mahaparsva, न्यपातयत् flung on
translation: The foremost of the Vanaras (Angada), taking an iron bar flung on Mahaparsva in the battlefield.

meaning: सःमहापार्श्वः that Mahaparsva, तेनप्रहारेण by that hit, विचेतनः lost consciousness, ससूतः with charioteer, तस्मात् from there, स्यन्दनात् chariot, विसंज्ञः senseless, भुवि on the ground, अपतत् fell
translation: By that hit, Mahaparsva became unconscious and fell on the ground, senseless, from the chariot along with the charioteer.

meaning: तेजस्वी mighty, नीलाञ्जनचयोपमः heap of dark black mountain, सुमहावीर्यः great hero, ऋक्षराजःking of Bears, क्रुद्धः angry, मेघसन्निभात् like a cloud, स्वयूथात् their army, निष्पत्य went, गिरिशृङ्गाभाम् resembling mountain peak, विपुलाम् huge, शिलाम् rock, प्रगृह्य seizing, तरसा rushed, तस्य his, अश्वान् horses, जघान struck, तम् them, स्यन्दनं च chariot, बभञ्ज crushed
translation: Jambavantha, the mighty king of Bears, rushed from his army that looked like a dark cloud. The great hero with his army resembling a heap of black mountain, in his fury seized a huge rock resembling a mountain peak, crushed the chariot and struck the horses.

meaning: तेजस्वी mighty, नीलाञ्जनचयोपमः heap of dark black mountain, सुमहावीर्यः great hero, ऋक्षराजःking of Bears, क्रुद्धः angry, मेघसन्निभात् like a cloud, स्वयूथात् their army, निष्पत्य went, गिरिशृङ्गाभाम् resembling mountain peak, विपुलाम् huge, शिलाम् rock, प्रगृह्य seizing, तरसा rushed, तस्य his, अश्वान् horses, जघान struck, तम् them, स्यन्दनं च chariot, बभञ्ज crushed
translation: Jambavantha, the mighty king of Bears, rushed from his army that looked like a dark cloud. The great hero with his army resembling a heap of black mountain, in his fury seized a huge rock resembling a mountain peak, crushed the chariot and struck the horses.

meaning: मुहूर्तात् in a short while, लब्धसंज्ञः gaining consciousness, महाबलः mighty, महापार्श्वः Mahaparsva, बहुभिः many, बाणैः shafts, तम् them, अङ्गदम् on Angada, भूयःagain, प्रत्यविध्यत struck in turn
translation: In a short while, regaining consciousness, mighty Mahaparsva struck Angada again with many shafts.

meaning: ऋक्षराजम् king of Bears, जाम्बवन्तम् Jambavantha, स्तनान्तरे chest, त्रिभिः three, बाणैः shafts, आजघान pierced, गवाक्षं च Gavaksha also, बहुभिः many, शरैः arrows, जघान attacked
translation: Mahaparsva pierced three shafts into the chest of Jambavantha and attacked Gavaksha with many arrows.

meaning: सअङ्गदःAngada, शरपीडितौ tormented by shafts, गवाक्षम् Gavaksha, जाम्बवन्तं च and Jambavantha, दृष्टवा seeing, क्रोधमूर्छितः deluded with anger, घोरम् dreadful, परिघम् iron bar, जग्राह took hold
translation: Seeing Gavaksha and Jambavantha afflicted by shafts, deluded with anger, Angada took hold of a dreadful iron bar.

meaning: वालिनः Vali's, सुतः son, अङ्गदः Angada, प्रकुपितः enraged, रविरमशिसमप्रभम् radiant like the sun's rays, आयसम् shone, तंपरिघम् that iron bar, द्वाभ्याम् both, भुजाभ्याम् arms, सङ्गृह्य seizing, वेगवान् with speed, भ्रामयित्वाच whirling round and round, दूरस्थितस्य at a distance, राक्षसस्य Rakshasa's, तस्य his, महापार्श्वस्य Mahaparsva's, वधार्थम् strike, चिक्षेप thrown
translation: Vali's son Angada got enraged, seized an iron bar which shone like the radiant sun's rays and stood at a distance to kill Mahaparsva. Angada whirling the iron bar round and round hurled it around and thrown at Mahaparsva.

meaning: वालिनः Vali's, सुतः son, अङ्गदः Angada, प्रकुपितः enraged, रविरमशिसमप्रभम् radiant like the sun's rays, आयसम् shone, तंपरिघम् that iron bar, द्वाभ्याम् both, भुजाभ्याम् arms, सङ्गृह्य seizing, वेगवान् with speed, भ्रामयित्वाच whirling round and round, दूरस्थितस्य at a distance, राक्षसस्य Rakshasa's, तस्य his, महापार्श्वस्य Mahaparsva's, वधार्थम् strike, चिक्षेप thrown
translation: Vali's son Angada got enraged, seized an iron bar which shone like the radiant sun's rays and stood at a distance to kill Mahaparsva. Angada whirling the iron bar round and round hurled it around and thrown at Mahaparsva.

meaning: बलवता mighty, क्षिप्तः broken, सःपरिघः that iron bar, तस्यरक्षसः that Rakshasa's, हस्तात् from hand, सशरम् arrows, धनुश्च bow, शिरस्त्रां forehead, चाप्यपातयत् thrown
translation: That iron bar hurled by Angada hit the forehead of the Rakshasa.

meaning: प्रतापवान्स courageous, वालिपुत्रः son of Vali, क्रुद्धः enraged, तम् him, वेगेन speedily, समासाद्य shining, सकुण्डले with ear rings, कर्णमूले decorated, तलेन with palm, अभ्यहनत् slapped
translation: Courageous son of Vali, enraged, with all speed, slapped the Rakshasa's ear adorned with shining earrings, with his palm.

meaning: महावेगः endowed with great speed, महाद्युतिः shining brightly, सःमहापार्श्वः that Mahaparsva, क्रुद्धः angry, एकेन one, करेण axe, सुमहान्तम् extraordinary, परश्वथम् a battle axe, जग्राह took hold of
translation: Angry Mahaparsva, who was endowed with speed and shining brightly, took hold of an extraordinary battle axe in one hand.

meaning: परमक्रुद्धः extremely enraged, राक्षसः Rakshasa, तैलधौतम् smeared with oil, विमलम् clean, शैलसारमयम् like feet of mountain, दृढम् strong, तंम् that, वालिपुत्रे Vali's son, न्यपातयत् hurled
translation: Extremely enraged Rakshasa, hurled at Vali's son that axe that was cleansed with oil, the clean strong axe that was like feet of a mountain.

meaning: रोषः full of fury, सःअङ्गदः that Angada, तेन by that, वामांसफलके left shoulder bone, भृशम् in violence, प्रत्यवपादितम् hurled in turn, परश्वधम् Parasva's, मोक्ष्यामास escaped
translation: Angada, full of fury, escaped Mahaparsva's aim to strike his left shoulder blade in violence.

meaning: पितृतुल्यपराक्रमःequal to father in prowess, वीरःheroic, सःअङ्गदःAngada, सुसङ्कृद्धः highly furious, आत्मनः himself, वज्रसङ्काशम् resembling thunderbolt, मुष्टिम् fist, सम्वर्तयामास clenched
translation: Angada, who was equal to his father in his prowess, was highly furious and himself clenched his fist which resembled thunderbolt.

meaning: मर्मज्ञः vital, सः he, राक्षसस्य Rakshasa's, स्तनाभ्याशे middle of the breasts, हृदयंप्रति into the heart, इन्द्राशनिसमस्पर्शम् equal to Indra's thunderbolt, मुष्टिम् fist, विन्यपातयत् pierced
translation: Angada who knew the vital parts, pierced into the middle of the breasts of the Rakshasa into the heart by his fist which was equal to Indra's thunderbolt.

meaning: महामृधे in that great conflict, तस्य his, तेन by that, निपातेन struck by the fist, अस्य his, राक्षसस्य Rakshasa's, हृदयम् heart, पफाल broke, सः he, हतः was killed, भुवि ground, पपात fell
translation: In that great conflict, struck by the fist, the Rakshasa (Mahaparsva's) heart broke and killed and fell on the ground.

meaning: तस्मिन् his, भूमौ on the ground, निपतिते fallen, तत् that, सैन्यम् army, सम्प्रचुक्षुभे bewildered, समरे in battle, रावणस्य Ravana's, महान् great, क्रोधः anger, अभवत् च became
translation: Mahaparsva having fallen down in the battle, the army was bewildered, and Ravana was overcome with anger.

meaning: प्रहृष्टानाम् highly rejoiced, वानराणाम् Vanaras, सुपुष्कलः high pitched, सिंहनादः roar, शब्देन sound, साट्टालगोपुराम् tall attics and gates, लङ्काम् Lanka, शब्देन by that sound, स्फोटयन्निवमहेन्द्रेण accompanied by Indra, देवानाम् gods, महान् great, नादःइव like sound, समभवत् happened
translation: Highly rejoiced Vanaras roared in high pitch sound. The tall attics and gates of Lanka vibrated with sound. Even the gods, accompanied by Indra, made great sounds.

meaning: प्रहृष्टानाम् highly rejoiced, वानराणाम् Vanaras, सुपुष्कलः high pitched, सिंहनादः roar, शब्देन sound, साट्टालगोपुराम् tall attics and gates, लङ्काम् Lanka, शब्देन by that sound, स्फोटयन्निवमहेन्द्रेण accompanied by Indra, देवानाम् gods, महान् great, नादःइव like sound, समभवत् happened
translation: Highly rejoiced Vanaras roared in high pitch sound. The tall attics and gates of Lanka vibrated with sound. Even the gods, accompanied by Indra, made great sounds.
